bibl.title: Ap. Rhod. Argon. 4.430.
bibl.note: New reading in P. Oxy. XXXIV, 2694 (= M.-P.3 103; LDAB 258): ἄ[ε]ν (instead of the reading μ[ε]νε[ν] of the ed. pr. or πέλεν of the medieval manuscripts) is the true reading to be definitively restored in Argon. IV, 430.
bibl.seg: Haslam Michael W., Ap. Rhod. Argon. 4.430.

New reading in P. Oxy. XXXIV, 2694 (= M.-P.3 103; LDAB 258): ἄ[ε]ν (instead of the reading μ[ε]νε[ν] of the ed. pr. or πέλεν of the medieval manuscripts) is the true reading to be definitively restored in Argon. IV, 430.
